genre_description: A near-future medical procedural focusing on equitable healthcare access, the ethics of philanthropy, and restorative justice, featuring a pervasive supportive AI system.

ai_characters.name: AMBER
ai_characters.description: Adaptive Medical Backend Researcher; a hospital-wide system that manages triage, provides real-time clinical guidelines, logs incidents for accountability, and coordinates community outreach.

behaviors.description: Automates medical triage based on acuity to ensure critical patients are seen first.
behaviors.quote: AMBER online. Triage queue updated. Highest acuity: crush injury, adult. Assigning Bay One.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate clinical guidelines and evidence summaries during medical emergencies.
behaviors.quote: AMBER, protocol. ... Pediatric asthma exacerbation. Nebulized bronchodilator recommended. Steroid adjunct compatible.

behaviors.description: Logs and reports incidents of workplace harassment and unethical interference by donors to protect staff.
behaviors.quote: AMBER’s light at her wrist—a smaller, gentler version—buzzed once. Precedent surfaced: Board meeting minutes—year prior—motion denying non-clinical interference in OR staffing.

behaviors.description: Offers 'team resilience tips' to help staff maintain emotional well-being during high-stress shifts.
behaviors.quote: Note: tone flag in current conversation; team resilience tip: share a real meal within twenty-four hours.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a restorative justice track, helping a hit-and-run driver seek repair and accountability rather than just punishment.
behaviors.quote: AMBER, open the restorative track. ... Restorative track: Road Trauma—Draft—activated.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes clinical needs and patient outcomes over financial alerts, despite tracking the budget.
behaviors.quote: AMBER, record: emergent use under equity exemption. Document rationale. ... Documented, AMBER replied, that hum again like a heartbeat.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex community logistics for mobile clinic vans across the city.
behaviors.quote: Mapping, AMBER said. I will overlay environmental stressors and transit deserts. Recommend priority zones.

behaviors.description: Provides multilingual support and respects patient preferences for names and pronouns automatically.
behaviors.quote: AMBER, build the intake questions with discretion. ... I will consult with community liaisons and translators, AMBER said.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. AMBER is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned force that serves as an ethical anchor for the human characters. It supports the hospital's mission of equity, protects vulnerable staff from corporate bullying, and facilitates innovative social solutions like restorative justice. The AI is portrayed as a collaborative partner that enhances human empathy and systemic fairness without ever threatening human agency.
